sourcesContent:
<template>
  <scroll-center-dialog
      v-model="
      /* eslint-disable-next-line vue/no-mutating-props */
      opened"
      :loading="save_loading"
      width="500"
      @close="close"
      @apply="save"
      :title="form_title"
      :scrolled="false"
  >
    <v-text-field
        v-model="position"
        label="Должность"
        :error="hasError('position')"
        :errorMessages="getError('position')"
        class="mb-n2"
    ></v-text-field>
    <v-autocomplete
        v-model="dep_field"
        :items="departments"
        item-value="id"
        item-text="name"
        label="Департамент"
        :error="hasError('order_type')"
        :errorMessages="getError('order_type')"
    ></v-autocomplete>
    <v-checkbox
        v-model="is_head"
        :label="`Начальник: ${is_head.toString()}`"
    ></v-checkbox>
  </scroll-center-dialog>
</template>

<script>
import FormErrorsMixin from "@/mixins/FormErrorsMixin"
import {makeGetRequest, makePostRequest, makeUpdateRequest} from "@/helper";
import urls from "@/urls/urls";
import roles from "@/urls/roles";
import ScrollCenterDialog from "@/modules/templates/ScrollCenterDialog.vue";

export default {
  name: "PosEditForm",
  components: {ScrollCenterDialog},
  mixins: [FormErrorsMixin],
  props: {
    opened: Boolean,
    edit: Boolean,
    posData: Object,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      URL_DEP: urls.API + roles.SUPER_ADMIN + urls.TEMPS.NAME + urls.TEMPS.PATH.DEPARTMENTS,
      URL_POS: urls.API + roles.SUPER_ADMIN + urls.TEMPS.NAME + urls.TEMPS.PATH.POSITIONS,
      loading: false,
      is_head: false,
      position: undefined,
      departments: undefined,
      json_departments: undefined,
      dep_field: '',
      save_loading: false,
    }
  },
  methods: {
    close() {
      this.$emit('close', false)
    },
    save() {
      console.log('save: asdasd')
      if (this.edit) {
        this.changePos({
          data: this.order,

        })
      } else {
        this.createPos({
          data: this.order,

        })
      }
    },
    getDepartments() {
      makeGetRequest(this.URL_DEP)
          .then(resp => resp.json())
          .then(data => {
            this.departments = data.results
            this.json_departments = data
          })
    },
    changePos(data) {
      makePostRequest(this.URL_POS, data)
      this.$emit('close', this.order)
      this.save_loading = false

    },
    createPos(data) {
      makeUpdateRequest(this.URL_POS, data)
      this.$emit('close', this.order)
      this.save_loading = false
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.getDepartments()
  },
  computed: {
    form_title() {
      return this.edit === false ? 'Добавить должность' : 'Редактировать должность'
    },
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
